properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
GUINEA.
DNC 01.
M/V ATTACKED IN 09-24.85N 013-43.32W AT 240110Z AUG.
VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO IMB
PIRACY REPORTING CENTER, PHONE: 603 2031 0014,
FAX: 603 2078 5769, E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG,
PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
